meanings.definition: To confine or restrict to a particular place or area.
meanings.sent1: The cat localizes its playtime to the living room.
meanings.sent2: The police localized the search to the park.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous elf localizes all the cookies in the jar.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter localizes in the room, filling it with joy.
meanings.sent5: The scent of fresh flowers localizes in the garden, inviting bees and butterflies.

meanings.definition: To focus on or identify the specific location of something.
meanings.sent1: The detective localizes the suspect at the crime scene.
meanings.sent2: The GPS device localizes your position accurately.
meanings.sent3: The curious child localizes the hidden treasure under the bed.
meanings.sent4: His attention localizes on the tiny details, missing nothing.
meanings.sent5: The spotlight localizes on the lead singer, captivating the audience.

meanings.definition: To adapt or tailor something to suit a particular region or group.
meanings.sent1: The restaurant localizes its menu to include regional specialties.
meanings.sent2: The company localizes its marketing strategy for different cultures.
meanings.sent3: The fashion designer localizes the clothing line for a specific audience.
meanings.sent4: She localizes her speech to be easily understood by children.
meanings.sent5: The artist localizes the artwork to reflect the local traditions and customs.
